title: IPN
content:
Is this a modified ITC Blair? I don't think so... Anyone knows this?   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124512im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/32275.gif)
author: adriano

comments.content: Anything's possible, but I guess I'd be surprised if this were a font. That P is so distorted it's almost a D, and I can't imagine a font with that sort of legibility problem would be very useful. I'd guess this is a custom designed logo, and whether it was morphed from another font, or created new is anyone's guess.
